body.p:
Bridgeport Alabama
March 12th 1864
Hon,, Thomas E. Bramlette,

We the undersigned officers of the Second Regiment of Kentucky Cavalry Volunteers, cheerfully recommend Louis W. Little of Company "L" for promotion: he is well qualifed for advancement, by education and experience, and has faithfully discharged his duty as a soldier, for the last two and a half years, and has reenlisted as a Veteran Volunteer.

E. Watts, lt. Col Comdg Rgt.
Henry E Collins Major
W. H. Eifort Major
James A Warden Lt co "L"
Edward. B. Curran Lt Comdg Co "A" 2nd Ky Cav
Granville J. Hasting Lt Comdg Co "G,"
L, H, Pinckston Captain 2nd Ky Cav --
William Arthur Capt
Co B 2d Ky Cavalry
John E Stillwell
1st Lieut Co D. 2nd Ky Cav.
Geo. W. Griffiths Adjt.
A. S. Park Capt, Co, G, 2d Ky Cavl
Owen Star Capt 2d Ky Cav
Lieut T.. C.. Nall Comdg Co 'F'
Samuel Lyon Lieut Comdg Co "H"
William C Adams Lieut Comdg Co E
W, G, Rogers. 1st Lieut & Q. M,
C. B. Ayars 1st Lieut & A, C, S,

Bridgeport Ala
March 12th 1864
Little Louis W
Watts E. S.
Lt Col.
And others
Recommendation
Recommending Louis W Little of Co L. 2d Ky Cavl for promotion.
